title: please fix ranked placements
body:
8/2 win/loss and still end up b5 is this a joke or what??.  We need a change as you can see with all the problems that have come up over placements.

Please fix this problem!

replies.body: I won 7 out of 10 and got put in bronze 4, I was bronze before this. I thought I was at least going to get bronze 1 or silver 5 but nope..

Im similarly disappointed. I worked hard last season climbing from B5 to S3, ended in S4.

I just won 8-2 placement matches and got placed in B4. I was even checking all my game ratings and I averaged an A. No less than a B+. I had 3+ KDA average, most ward plaements in almost every game.

I dont know what riot is using to calculate the new placements, but they have made it near impossible from what ive seen to improve on ranking from last season..

I have poured hundred of hours and money into this game and tbh I dont even feel like playing anymore after this.
i was gold 5 at the end of the season i did my placements 5/5 and i get into bronze 2 how can this be how can i drop 500 elo and i dont even lose more then wath i win this is a huge bug most be OMG..

Where were you both before season ended? (Be honest) I'm seeing a lot of my friends complaining about being put into B5, but they were B4 before the season ended... Maybe it's not same for you, but it's what I've noticed.

Edit - The season is not a hard reset, you don't start with a blank slate. Your MMR is averaged to around where you were in the previous season and are placed according to your placement matches, I'm not 100% sure, but I believe it's quite rare to be placed in a higher rank than where you finished the season. At least, I've never seen it happen.
I feel your pain bro i had tried so hard and won 6  games and get put in bronze 5. idk if thats a bug/glitch or something else
